thread.section_title: Hotel L'Antoine - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Extreem friendly staff
thread.title_full: Extreem friendly staff - Review of Hotel L'Antoine, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: J. van V
title: Extreem friendly staff
text:
The staff at the hotel is very friendly and helpfull. Not one desk staff member, but ALL of them. Not made up, but genuine. I travel a lot, so a lot of hotes to compare with.
One suggestion for improvement is WIFI strength.
Harry
Room Tip: streetview is nice, but could a bit noisy. See more room tips
